gaps_found.message: BR-001 (WS no block main thread) has no explicit traceability row in matrix - covered implicitly by REQ-001-001-001 React hook pattern
BR-003 (graceful degradation) not explicitly traced in Source column - covered by REQ-001-001-006 with Source=US-001
BR-006 (failed UI actions no backend impact) not explicitly traced - covered implicitly by REQ-001-002-003
BR-007 (no actions if WS disconnected) not explicitly traced - covered implicitly by REQ-001-001-006 graceful degradation
BR-009 (cumulative data) not explicitly traced in Source column - covered by REQ-002-001-002 with Source=US-006
BR-010 (immediate mutations) not explicitly traced - covered by REQ-002-004-003 with Source=US-009
BR-012 (backward compat) not explicitly traced - covered by REQ-002-004-002 with Source=US-009
BR-014 (contained hosts status) not explicitly traced as specific requirement - covered implicitly by REQ-002-001-003 mutations
BR-015 (closed incidents status) not explicitly traced - covered implicitly by REQ-002-001-003 mutations
BR-016 (thread-safe asyncio Lock) not explicitly traced - covered by REQ-002-001-004 with Source=US-006
BR-017 (MITRE ATT&CK ordering) not explicitly traced - covered implicitly by REQ-002-002-001 MITRE mapping
REQ-001-001-003 AC says pulse or glow but REQ-001-004-002 defines three modes (pulse, glow, zoom) - minor AC inconsistency

_schema.description: SBX Design Execution Log - Tracks all steps and ensures enforcement
